query:
ALTER TABLE customEvidences 
ADD COLUMN isPublic BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL AFTER customFields,
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'approved' NOT NULL
